```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r load in data}
justice_Docket <- read_xlsx("raw-data/SCDB_2019_01_justiceCentered_Docket.xlsx") %>% 
  clean_names()

justice_Citation <- read_xlsx("raw-data/SCDB_2019_01_justiceCentered_Citation.xlsx") %>% 
  clean_names()

justice_LegalProvision <- read_xlsx("raw-data/SCDB_2019_01_justiceCentered_LegalProvision.xlsx") %>% 
  clean_names()

# I loaded in 3 Excel sheets of data from the Supreme Court.
```
```

```{r initial viewing of data}

glimpse(justice_Docket)
glimpse(justice_Citation)
glimpse(justice_LegalProvision)

```
